data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karaman, Ivo M., Bedek, Jana, Horvatović, Mladen (2009): Thaumatoniscellus speluncae n. sp. (Isopoda: Oniscidea: Trichoniscidae), a new troglobitic oniscid species from Croatia. Zootaxa 2158: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188890
